attributes.action: Vote no on UK leaving the EU to prevent security risks
attributes.background: If David Cameron fails to get his deal for cutting the entitlement of EU migrants to claim benefits in the UK, he threatens for the UK to leave the EU thereby suggesting that it can also help the UK respond quicker and stronger to complex terrorist threats(despite the many risks it may entail).

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be asking members of the public to vote no in the EU referendum. By law, there will be a referendum before the end of 2017 on the UK's membership of the EU.

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take action.
